attributes.action: Labour MPs in Wales who  do not represent majority views should resign
attributes.additional_details: These Welsh labour MPs refused the party whip and did not support the notification of withdrawal bill 1st Feb 2017 and have boasted they will not support triggering art 50 and will try to overturn Brexit, Owen smith said on the Itv show Agenda with tom Bradbury "his constituents voted 50/50" and that's why he will vote against art 50, his Pontypridd constituents  voted 53.7% to 46.3% to leave ,
attributes.background: Owen smith Chris Bryant Anne clwydd all voted against the wishes of their constituents who voted to leave the Eu on 23 June 2017 , they have lost the support of the majority and therefore should resign and their constituents can have a say on the undemocratic Welsh labour party
